title: Albany 2 bedroom/1 bathroom
posting_body: Large and spacious 2 bedroom, 1 bath apartment available in a quiet, sunny and friendly, smokeless five-plex building in Albany.
Walk half a block to Solano Avenue, YMCA, restaurants, shops and theatres.
Walking distance to BART, Safeway, Sprouts, Trader Joe’s and coffee shops.
Apartment is 900 square feet, with large closets in both bedrooms and a linen closet in the hallway.
Kitchen is equipped with all appliances including dishwasher.
Bathroom is large with ceiling skylight.
All windows are double pane windows, well insulated.
Apartment is spacious and open with lots of natural light.
Onsite coin laundry in building, additional storage unit in laundry room, carport with 2 tandem parking spots.
Property is well maintained with gardener.
Exterior of building has been recently painted.
Albany has excellent schools, fast commute to the city.
Rent is $2500 per month, security deposit 1.5 x rent, 1 year lease.
